nodes.documentation:
@title VitualLands of Shangeri-La

	 * A script that manages 10 000 tokens that represents a piece of vitual land within Shangeri-La.
nodes.name: VirtualLands

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner permitted to call"

arguments.value: Only the owner permitted to call

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner permitted to call"

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets the total supply limit of the virtual land tokens
nodes.name: totalSupplyLimit

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets the price for initial supply of virtual lands
nodes.name: initialPrice

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "value sent must be exactly equals to price"

arguments.value: value sent must be exactly equals to price

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "value sent must be exactly equals to price"

nodes.documentation: @dev Initial acquisition of the token
nodes.name: initialBuyToken

nodes.documentation:
@dev changing the initialprice for sale, can only be called by owner
 @notice the _initialPrice is in Wei
nodes.name: setInitialPrice

nodes.documentation: @dev changing the description of the token
nodes.name: setTokenDescription

nodes.documentation: @dev changing the link of the token
nodes.name: setTokenLink

nodes.documentation: @dev withdraw ether off the contract
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev putting token up for sale
 @notice the _price is in Wei
nodes.name: sellToken

nodes.documentation: @dev buying token from someone
nodes.name: buyToken

nodes.documentation: @dev removing a sale proposition
nodes.name: removeTokenFromSale

nodes.documentation: @dev changing the colors of the token
nodes.name: setTokenPixelsColors
